General.Name: Hyliion Holdings Corp
General.Description: Hyliion Holdings Corp. designs, develops, and sells electrified powertrain solutions for the commercial vehicle industry. It offers battery management systems for hybrid and fully electric vehicle applications; and battery packs. The company was founded in 2015 and is headquartered in Cedar Park, Texas.
General.Address: 1202 BMC Drive, Cedar Park, TX, United States, 78613
